trans-unit.source: How to create APIs, operations, and products in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How to create APIs, operations, and products in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create APIs, operations, and products in API Management.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create APIs, operations, and products in API Management.

trans-unit.source: How to create APIs, operations, and products in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How to create APIs, operations, and products in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: In Azure API Management, APIs and their operations are added to products, where they can be used by the developers building applications that use the APIs.
trans-unit.target: In Azure API Management, APIs and their operations are added to products, where they can be used by the developers building applications that use the APIs.

trans-unit.source: The guides in this section show how to create an API, add operations to it, and then associate the API with a product and publish it for developers to use.
trans-unit.target: The guides in this section show how to create an API, add operations to it, and then associate the API with a product and publish it for developers to use.

trans-unit.source: How to create APIs
trans-unit.target: How to create APIs

trans-unit.source: An API in API Management represents a set of operations that can be invoked by client applications.
trans-unit.target: An API in API Management represents a set of operations that can be invoked by client applications.

trans-unit.source: New APIs are created in the API Management portal.
trans-unit.target: New APIs are created in the API Management portal.

trans-unit.source: This guide shows how to create and configure a new API in API Management.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows how to create and configure a new API in API Management.

trans-unit.source: How to create APIs
trans-unit.target: How to create APIs

trans-unit.source: How to add operations to an API
trans-unit.target: How to add operations to an API

trans-unit.source: Before an API in API Management can be used, operations must be added.
trans-unit.target: Before an API in API Management can be used, operations must be added.

trans-unit.source: This guide shows how to add and configure different types of operations to an API in API Management.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows how to add and configure different types of operations to an API in API Management.

trans-unit.source: How to add operations to an API
trans-unit.target: How to add operations to an API

trans-unit.source: An API and its operations can also be imported in one steps, in either WADL or Swagger format.
trans-unit.target: An API and its operations can also be imported in one steps, in either WADL or Swagger format.

trans-unit.source: How to import the definition of an API with operations
trans-unit.target: How to import the definition of an API with operations

trans-unit.source: How create and publish a product
trans-unit.target: How create and publish a product

trans-unit.source: In API Management, a product contains one or more APIs as well as a usage quota and the terms of use.
trans-unit.target: In API Management, a product contains one or more APIs as well as a usage quota and the terms of use.

trans-unit.source: Once a product is published, developers can subscribe to the product and begin to use the product's APIs.
trans-unit.target: Once a product is published, developers can subscribe to the product and begin to use the product's APIs.

trans-unit.source: these topics provide a guide to creating a product, adding an API, and publishing it for developers.
trans-unit.target: these topics provide a guide to creating a product, adding an API, and publishing it for developers.
